text: vy vidznachyly khto sperechavsya z Abraham pro yoho Lorda, khoch BOH dav yomu tsaryuvannya? Abraham skazav, "Miy Lord harantuye zhyttya ta smertʹ." Vin skazav, "ya harantuyu zhyttya ta smertʹ." Abraham skazav, "BOH prynosytʹ sontse z skhodu, vy mozhete prynesty tse z zakhodu?" disbeliever stumped. BOH ne keruye bezputnyy
